definitions.definition: A bird in the genus Meleagris with a fan - shaped tail and wattled neck , especially the wild turkey ( Meleagris gallopavo , now domesticated ).
The flesh or meat of this bird eaten as food .
examples: All week after Thanksgiving, I had turkey sandwiches for lunch.

definitions.definition: With a distinguishing word : a bird resembling the Meleagris gallopavo (for example, the brush turkey or bush turkey ( Alectura lathami ), and the water turkey ( Anhinga anhinga )).
An act of throwing three strikes in a row .
A patient feigning symptoms ; a person faking illness or injury ; a malingerer .
A pack carried by a lumberman ; a bindle ; also, a large travel bag , a suitcase .

examples: The turkey cut in front of me and then berated me for running into him.
definitions.label_groups: countable , US , slang , usually mildly derogatory

definitions.definition: A prostitute . (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: ( countable , originally, now obsolete ) The guinea fowl ( family Numididae ). [from c. 1600]
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A bird in the genus Meleagris with a fan - shaped tail and wattled neck , especially the wild turkey ( Meleagris gallopavo , now domesticated ).
( uncountable ) The flesh or meat of this bird eaten as food .
( countable ) With a distinguishing word : a bird resembling the Meleagris gallopavo (for example, the brush turkey or bush turkey ( Alectura lathami ), and the water turkey ( Anhinga anhinga )).
( countable , bowling ) An act of throwing three strikes in a row .
( countable , medicine , slang , derogatory ) A patient feigning symptoms ; a person faking illness or injury ; a malingerer .
( countable , Australia , US , slang , dated ) A pack carried by a lumberman ; a bindle ; also, a large travel bag , a suitcase . [from early 20th c.]
( countable , US , slang , usually mildly derogatory ) A foolish or inept person .
( African-American Vernacular , Baltimore , slang , derogatory ) A prostitute . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
